column2: The company was founded with a heartfelt intention to provide top-quality, affordable baby essentials in the market. Recognizing a gap in the availability of such products, the founders embarked on a journey to offer practical and aesthetically pleasing designs to make parenting easier. From bibs to strollers to fashionable clothing, the company strives to cater to all aspects of parenthood, ensuring that parents can navigate this transformative journey with ease. We are seeking a highly creative and skilled Fashion Designer with a passion for innovative design, a basic understanding of AI tools, and expertise in creating tech packs. The ideal candidate will assist in vendor coordination, and sampling follow-ups, and have a keen interest in kids' wear designs. Key Responsibilities: Stay updated on the latest fashion trends, emerging styles, and consumer preferences. Research and analyze fabric trends, textures, and materials suitable for different fashion lines. Assist in designing using AI software; Graphic designs skills are must. Communicate effectively with team members, suppliers, and manufacturers to ensure design concepts are translated accurately. Assist in sourcing materials and suppliers for prototype development and production. Assist in maintaining design archives and organizing design assets. Education: Diploma (Preferred) Experience: Total work: 2 years (Preferred) Fashion design: 2 years (Preferred)

column2: Job Summary : Skyria, a size inclusive activewear brand for women, is looking for a proactive and skilled Fashion Designer to join our team. This role involves overseeing the production lifecycle of activewear from initial concept through to final product delivery. The successful candidate will ensure that all products meet Skyria's high standards of quality and design. Key Responsibilities: Conduct market research and analysis to stay informed on the latest trends and consumer preferences in the activewear market. Design garments and translate concepts into viable products, considering factors like fabric selection and cost implications. Coordinate production schedules, monitor progress, and resolve any issues or delays in the manufacturing process. Identify and evaluate potential suppliers and manufacturers to source the necessary fabrics and trims. Establish and maintain strong relationships with suppliers, negotiating pricing and production schedules to ensure timely delivery. Implement quality control measures to inspect and evaluate samples and production batches, ensuring all products meet design and quality standards. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in fashion merchandising, apparel production, business, or a related field. In-depth knowledge of apparel manufacturing processes, particularly in activewear. Strong project management skills, capable of managing multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment. Excellent communication skills, proficient in coordinating with cross-functional teams. Strong analytical skills, capable of making data-driven decisions based on sales and market analysis. What can you expect: A great work environment with massive ownership and growth opportunities. Work closely with the co-founders. Opportunity to make a positive impact. Competitive salary plus great work environment

column2: The Professor in the Department of Textile and Fashion Designing will be responsible for designing and delivering courses in Textile and Fashion Designing, conducting research, supervising students, and contributing to the development of the department.           Responsibilities:         Design and deliver courses in Textile and Fashion Designing, both theoretical and practical, at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels.     Conduct and supervise research projects in Textile and Fashion Designing, in collaboration with students, faculty members, and external partners.     Mentor and supervise students in their academic, research and professional development.     Contribute to the development of the Department of Textile and Fashion Designing and participate in the colleges academic and administrative committees.     Engage with industry partners, develop partnerships and foster collaborations in the field of Textile and Fashion Designing.             Qualifications:         PhD or equivalent in Textile and Fashion Designing, or related fields.     At least 10 years of teaching and research experience in Textile and Fashion Designing.     A track record of high-quality research in the field of Textile and Fashion Designing.     A proven ability to teach and mentor students at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels.     Good communication, interpersonal, and teamwork skills.     Familiarity with the latest trends and technologies in the field of Textile and Fashion Designing.         Eligible Fields:         Textile and Apparel Design     Fashion Merchandising and Marketing     Fashion Design and Technology     Textile Science and Technology     Fashion and Textile Management     Fashion Communication and Journalism     Sustainable Textile and Apparel Design     Textile Engineering and Technology     Fashion and Textile History and Theory     Apparel Production and Manufacturing.             Note:                   Salary for all positions will be based on qualification and experience and will not be a limiting factor for the right candidate.
